mapper.select: SELECT user_id, img_key, upload_time FROM upload WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO upload(user_id, img_key, size, ext_name, upload_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{imgKey}, #{size}, #{extName}, #{uploadTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM upload WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE organize_name = #{organizeName})
